author: Adam Savage’s Tested
description:
What are Adam Savage's thoughts about the Chinese water torture MythBusters episode?  What was a surprising material that proved to be the precise solution Adam needed while testing a myth? In this live stream excerpt Adam answers these questions from Tested members @SilverDefender and @philredbeard, whom we thank for their support! Join this channel to support Tested and get access to perks, like asking Adam a question:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCiDJtJKMICpb9B1qf7qjEOA/join

This Myth Generated the Most Personal Backlash Against Adam and Jamie: https://youtu.be/XrBzjqroSHY
More MythBusters-Related videos: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=D8vTHbqHT9Y&list=PLJtitKU0CAehaZdgrPRzjyGFSEQ8URiQl

Subscribe for more videos (and click the bell for notifications):  http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=testedcom

title: The MythBusters Episode Adam Savage Regrets Making
